parameters.content:
### üîπ **1. `Trigger: On Form Submission`**

* **Node Type:** Manual Trigger (or Webhook if embedded in a real form)
* **Purpose:** Starts the workflow when a user submits a form with an Instagram username
* **Expected Input:**

  ```json
  {
    "username": "influencer_1"
  }
  ```

---

### üîπ **2. `Scrape Instagram Profile via Apify`**

* **Node Type:** HTTP Request

* **Method:** `POST`

* **URL:**

  ```plaintext
  https://api.apify.com/v2/actor-tasks/<TASK_ID>/run-sync-get-dataset-items?token=<API_TOKEN>
  ```

* **Headers:**

  ```json
  {
    "Content-Type": "application/json"
  }
  ```

* **Body Parameters:**

  ```json
  {
    "input": {
      "usernames": ["={{ $json.username }}"]
    }
  }
  ```

* **Sample Output from Apify:**

  ```json
  [
    {
      "username": "influencer_1",
      "fullName": "Jane Doe",
      "followersCount": 12500,
      "followsCount": 320,
      "biography": "Travel | Lifestyle üåç",
      "profilePicUrl": "https://instagram.com/path/to/pic.jpg",
      "isPrivate": false,
      "isVerified": true,
      "externalUrl": "https://janedoe.com"
    }
  ]
  ```

‚úÖ **Result:** The username submitted from the form is scraped in real time using Apify‚Äôs Instagram actor, and the result is passed to the next step.

## ‚ú® SECTION 2: üõ† Format Data + üìä Append to Google Sheets

### üîπ **3. `Format Instagram Profile Data`**

* **Node Type:** Set
* **Purpose:** Clean and organize the Apify response to match your Google Sheets schema
* **Fields to Set:**

  | Field Name        | Value                      |
  | ----------------- | -------------------------- |
  | `Username`        | `{{$json.username}}`       |
  | `Full Name`       | `{{$json.fullName}}`       |
  | `Followers`       | `{{$json.followersCount}}` |
  | `Following`       | `{{$json.followsCount}}`   |
  | `Bio`             | `{{$json.biography}}`      |
  | `Profile Pic URL` | `{{$json.profilePicUrl}}`  |
  | `Website`         | `{{$json.externalUrl}}`    |

‚úÖ **Result:** The data is transformed into a clean format suitable for logging or outreach tracking.

---

### üîπ **4. `Append Profile to Google Sheet`**

* **Node Type:** Google Sheets (Append Row)
* **Setup:**

  * **Sheet Name:** `Scraped_Influencer_Data`
  * **Columns:** Username, Full Name, Followers, Following, Bio, Profile Pic URL, Website
* **Purpose:** Stores the formatted data into a centralized Google Sheet for future reference or outreach

‚úÖ **Result:** Your influencer data is persistently stored and ready to be used for marketing, analytics, or CRM integration.

---

## ‚úÖ Final Workflow Summary

```plaintext
[Form Trigger] 
   ‚¨áÔ∏è
[Apify HTTP Request] 
   ‚¨áÔ∏è
[Format Fields]
   ‚¨áÔ∏è
[Google Sheet Append]
```

=======================================
            WORKFLOW ASSISTANCE
=======================================
For any questions or support, please contact:
    Yaron@nofluff.online

Explore more tips and tutorials here:
   - YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@YaronBeen/videos
   - LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/yaronbeen/
=======================================

# üß† **Workflow Overview: Instagram Profile Scraper using Apify & Google Sheets in n8n**

## üîç **Purpose**

This n8n automation workflow allows you to **scrape Instagram profile data** using the **Apify Instagram Scraper** and **store the results in Google Sheets** for marketing, outreach, or analytics. It's designed to be simple, efficient, and extendable ‚Äî ideal for influencer marketers, social analysts, or growth teams who want actionable Instagram data without writing code.

---

## üß© **Core Workflow Logic**

### üí° What It Does

1. **Receives an Instagram username** (via form or manual trigger)
2. **Sends the username to Apify** to scrape public profile data
3. **Extracts key details** (followers, bio, profile pic, etc.)
4. **Appends the cleaned data** to a structured Google Sheet

---

## üèóÔ∏è **Workflow Structure & Components**

## üìä **Data Flow Example**

### üî∏ **Input (Submitted via Form or Manual Trigger):**

```json
{
  "username": "influencer_1"
}
```

### üîπ **Output (Saved to Google Sheets):**

| Username      | Full Name | Followers | Following | Bio    | Profile Pic URL | Website                                                        |                                            |
| ------------- | --------- | --------- | --------- | ------ | --------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------ |
| influencer\_1 | Jane Doe  | 12,500    | 320       | Travel | Lifestyle üåç    | [https://instagram.com/pic.jpg](https://instagram.com/pic.jpg) | [https://janedoe.com](https://janedoe.com) |

---

## üõ†Ô∏è **Built With**

* [n8n](https://n8n.io/) ‚Äì Open-source workflow automation
* [Apify](https://apify.com/) ‚Äì Instagram Profile Scraper actor
* Google Sheets (native integration via n8n)

---

## üîê **Authentication & API Notes**

* **Apify Token**: Required in the HTTP Request URL
* **Google Sheets Access**: OAuth2 credentials configured in n8n
* **Security Tip**: Store secrets as [n8n environment variables](https://docs.n8n.io/hosting/environment-variables/)

---

## üíº **Real-World Use Cases**

| Use Case                  | Description                                                   |
| ------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------- |
| üë©‚Äçüíº Influencer Outreach | Automatically collect Instagram metrics for campaign planning |
| üìä Competitor Analysis    | Track follower growth and bio updates for competitors         |
| üìã CRM Enrichment         | Enrich influencer records with live Instagram data            |

---

## üöÄ **Enhancements & Ideas**

* üîÅ **Loop from Google Sheets:** Read a batch of usernames and scrape in loop
* üö´ **Avoid Duplicates:** Add an `IF` node to skip usernames already scraped
* üì© **Send Slack/Email Alerts** when new data is added
* üß† **Filter Low Engagement Accounts** (e.g., if followers < 1,000)

---

## üì∏ **Visual Workflow Map**

```plaintext
[Trigger: On Form Submission]
          ‚¨áÔ∏è
[Scrape Instagram Profile via Apify]
          ‚¨áÔ∏è
[Format Instagram Profile Data]
          ‚¨áÔ∏è
[Append Profile to Google Sheet]
```

---

## üßæ **Conclusion**

This workflow is a **powerful no-code solution** to streamline the process of gathering Instagram profile data. It integrates the flexibility of n8n, the scraping power of Apify, and the accessibility of Google Sheets to form a seamless automation ‚Äî perfect for creators, marketers, and analysts.
